Related repos

  • Transcribes audio streams in real-time
  • Transcribes YouTube videos and files locally via Whisper
  • desktop app for fast audio transcription with Whisper, supports batch files, live mode, Windows and macOS
  • real-time speech-to-text and translation using Whisper models
  • Transcribes voice to text with local AI enhancement on macOS
  • Speech-to-text tool using CTranslate2 for OpenAI Whisper model transcriptions
  • Transcribes and translates audio offline using Whisper on your computer
  • Transcribes audio into notes on your infrastructure
  • Speech-to-text model for audio transcription, translation, and language detection
